App Name: Video Maker with Photo & Music
App Package Name: com.videomaker.photovideo

Brief:

Turn your cherished memories into mesmerizing videos with Video Maker with Photo & Music. This user-friendly app allows you to craft stunning videos by combining your photos with music, paired with breathtaking 2D and 3D transition effects. Whether you wish to create a memorable gift or share your moments on social media, this app ensures your videos stand out without the hassle of watermarks.
